scripts.start: concurrently -k -n CLIENT,SERVER -c green,blue "dotenv -e ./.env -- cross-env PORT=3000 npm --prefix client run start" "dotenv -e ./.env -- cross-env npm --prefix server run start"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n CLIENT,SERVER -c green,blue "dotenv -e ./.env -- cross-env PORT=3000 npm --prefix client run dev" "dotenv -e ./.env -- cross-env npm --prefix server run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.server-only: dotenv -e ./.env -- cross-env npm --prefix server run start
scripts.client-only: dotenv -e ./.env -- cross-env PORT=3000 npm --prefix client run start
